DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare efficacy safety Ibuprofen 5 % Topical Gel versus placebo administer two three time daily treatment pain associate delayed onset muscle soreness follow intense eccentric exercise elbow flexor muscle .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Ibuprofen Delayed Onset Mulscle Soreness
DOC.criteria: Males female , 18 65 year age , engage upper extremity fitness activity minimum 3 month prior entry study ; subject must willing refrain use pharmacologic non pharmacologic treatment ( ie , heat , ice , massage ) form soreness relief study Use corticosteroid short longacting nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug
